anya-e0813n1:3_1: Taṁ yathā-a ā-i ī-u ū-e o,
anya-e0813n1:3_7: ya ra la va sa ha ḷa aṁ-iti.
anya-e0813n1:5_0: Tattha akkharesu okārantā aṭṭha sarā nāma. Tattheti vattate.
anya-e0813n1:7_0: Tattha saresu lahumattā a, i, u iti tayo rassā.
anya-e0813n1:10_0: Saṁyogato pubbe eo rassā ivoccante, anantarā byañjanā saṁyogo. Ettha, seyyo, oṭṭho, sotthi.
anya-e0813n1:12_0: Sare ṭhapetvā sesā kādayo niggahītantā byañjanā.
anya-e0813n1:14_0: Byañjanānaṁ kādayo makārantā pañcapañcaso akkharavanto vaggā.
anya-e0813n1:15_5: sabbanāma, pada, upasagga, nipāta, taddhita, ākhyāta,
anya-e0813n1:17_0: Aṁiti akārato paraṁ yo bindu sūyate, taṁ niggahītaṁ nāma.
anya-e0813n1:23_2: ‘‘pubbamadhoṭhita massaraṁ sarena viyojaye’’ti pubbabyañjanaṁ sarato puthakkātabbaṁ.
anya-e0813n1:25_0: Anantare sare pare sarā lopaṁ papponti.
anya-e0813n1:26_0: ‘‘Nare paraṁ yutte’’ti assaro byañjano parakkharaṁ netabbo lokaggo.
anya-e0813n1:29_0: 12. Saretyadhikāro. Pana ime pana imetīha-sarā lopaṁ itveva.
anya-e0813n1:31_0: Asamānarūpāsaramhā paro saro vā lupyate, paname, panime.
anya-e0813n1:34_0: Sare lutte parasarassa kvaci asavaṇṇo hotīti i u iccetesaṁ ṭhānāsannā e o. Bandhusseva. Nopeti.
anya-e0813n1:35_0: 14. Tatra ayaṁ, yāni idha, bahu upakāraṁ, saddhā idha, tathā upamantyetasmiṁ –
anya-e0813n1:37_0: Sare lutte paro saro kvaci ṭhānāsannaṁ dīghaṁ yāti. Tatrāyaṁ, yānīdha,
anya-e0813n1:40_0: Sare lutte pubbo ca kvaci dīghaṁ yāti. Kiṁ sūdha.
anya-e0813n1:43_0: Sare pare antassa ekārassa kvaci yo ādeso hoti, tyajja,
anya-e0813n1:47_0: Sare pare anto kārukārānaṁ kvaci vo ādeso hoti. Svassa, anveti.
anya-e0813n1:51_0: Sare pare dhassa kvaci do hoti. Dīghe – idāhaṁ.
anya-e0813n1:54_0: Sare pare ivaṇṇassa yo navā hoti.
anya-e0813n1:54_1: Kata yakārassa tissa ‘‘sabbo cantī’’ti kvaci cādese ‘‘paradvebhāvo ṭhāne’’ti sarato parabyañjanassa ṭhānāsannavasā dvittaṁ.
anya-e0813n1:56_0: Ettha ‘‘kvaci paṭi patisse’’ti patissa paṭi, vaṇṇaggahaṇaṁ sabbattha rassadīgha saṅgahaṇatthaṁ.
anya-e0813n1:59_0: Sarato parassa evassādiekāro rittaṁ navā yāti. Pubbo ca ṭhānāsannaṁ rassaṁ. Yathariva. Yatheva.
anya-e0813n1:61_0: Ya va ma da na ta ra ḷā cāgamā.
anya-e0813n1:62_0: Sare pare yādayo āgamā vā honti,
anya-e0813n1:63_0: Vāti kiṁ. Cha abhiññā, putha eva, pā eva.
anya-e0813n1:64_0: Ettha ‘‘sare kvacī’’ti sarānaṁ pakati hoti, sassarūpameva, na vikārotyattho.
anya-e0813n1:69_0: 23. Byañjanetyadhikāro. Kvacītveva. So bhikkhu, kacci nu tvaṁ, jānema tantīha –
anya-e0813n1:75_0: Vagge ghosāghosānaṁ catutthadutiyānaṁ tabbagge tatiyapaṭhamā honti yathāsaṅkhyaṁ yutte ṭhāne, ugghoso,
anya-e0813n1:77_0: 26. Ava naddhātyatra – ‘‘o avasse’’ti kvaci avassa o. Onaddhā.
anya-e0813n1:81_0: 27. Niggahītantyadhikāro . Kiṁ kato, saṁ jāto, saṁ ṭhito, taṁ dhanaṁ, taṁ mittantiha –
anya-e0813n1:83_0: Vaggabyañjane pare bindussa tabbagganto vā hoti. Kiṅkato, sañjāto, saṇṭhito, tandhanaṁ, tammittaṁ.
anya-e0813n1:88_0: Sare pare binduno ma dā vā honti. Evamassa, etadavoca.
anya-e0813n1:92_0: Ekāre, he ca pare binduno ño vā hoti. Dvitte – taññeva, tameva. Tañhi, taṁ hi.
anya-e0813n1:95_0: Yakāre pare tena saha binduno ño vā hoti. Dvitte – saññogo, saṁyogo.
anya-e0813n1:96_0: 31. Cakkhu aniccaṁ, ava sirotīha - āgamo, kvacitveva.
anya-e0813n1:98_0: Sare, byañjane vā pare kvaci bindvāgamo hoti. Cakkhuṁaniccaṁ, avaṁsiro.
anya-e0813n1:105_0: Binduto paro saro vā lupyate, bījaṁva.
anya-e0813n1:108_0: Binduto pare sare lutte saṁyogo byañjano vinaṭṭhasaṁyogo hotīti pubbasalopo. Evaṁsa.
anya-e0813n1:112_0: Idhāniddiṭṭhā sandhayo vuttānusārena ñe yyā, yathā –
anya-e0813n1:114_0: Pari esanātīha – yādese rakārassa yo, payyesa nā.
anya-e0813n1:116_0: Sarati, iti eva, sā itthī, busaṁ eva, bahu ābādho, adhi abhavi, sukhaṁ, dukkhaṁ, jīvotīha –
anya-e0813n1:117_0: Māgamo sakāre akārassa u ca, sumarati.
anya-e0813n1:120_0: Mādese , pubbadīghe ca ekārassa i. Busāmiva.
anya-e0813n1:123_0: Binduno, okārassa ca e. Sukhe, dukkhe, jīve.
anya-e0813n1:125_1: byañjane vā pare binduno kvaci mo.
anya-e0813n1:125_4: pubbe mo paraṁ na netabbo ayuttattā.
anya-e0813n1:127_0: Taṁ iminā, evaṁ imaṁ, kiṁ ahaṁ tīha-issa a. Tadaminā.
anya-e0813n1:128_0: Issa u, akārassa ca e, bindulopādo. Evumaṁ, kehaṁ.
anya-e0813n1:131_0: 43. Alābūnityādo akāralopo. Lābūni sīdanti, silā plavanti.
anya-e0813n1:133_0: Akaramhase tetyādo sakāre garuno ekārassa iminā lahuakāro, akaramhasa te kiccaṁ.
anya-e0813n1:135_0: Dīgho, saṁyogādipubbo rasso ca garu, lahu tu rasso. Yathā- ā, assa, aṁ, a.
